page.title: 16A HUMOROUS SHOPPING TRIP
page.content: The{busiest}day at the{Superstore}is Saturday. Mr. and Mrs. Smith went to buy{new units}for their{kitchen}and this is what happened. As they got out of their car in the {crowded carpark}they discovered they had a{puncture}on the{back left hand {tyre.}Mr. Smith found this most {annoying}as he had{no equipment}with him to put on the{spare tyre.}He had to go and buy{some tools.}Then just as he lifted the{spare}to put it in{place {"Crash!"}It fell{slap bang}on top of his{toe.}His{face}went bright{red.}Mrs Smith raced off through the{crowd}to get some{help.}As she passed through the{automatic door}she banged into a man carrying{rolls of wallpaper.}Next moment{everywhere}there was{wallpaper {rolling}about in the{carpark.}She managed to get an{assistant}who went out to the{carpark}to help Mr.Smith.
